statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name, customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' OR customer_name LIKE 'M%' AND address IS NULL ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_price > 100;
SELECT purchased_item, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customer WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchased_item FROM Customer JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customer.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_price FROM Customer JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customer.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id WHERE PurchaseHistory.purchased_item = 'Shoes';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, price FROM paintings ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT painting_name, artist_name, price FROM paintings WHERE price > 500;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT p.painting_name, p.artist_name, p.price, c.customer_name FROM paintings p JOIN purchases pu ON p.painting_id = pu.painting_id JOIN customers c ON pu.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_price FROM customers c JOIN purchases pu ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id WHERE purchase_price > 500;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT painting_name, painting_artist, painting_price FROM paintings ORDER BY painting_price DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.purchase_date, pa.painting_name FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN paintings pa ON p.purchase_id = pa.painting_id;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT painting_name, painting_artist, painting_price FROM paintings;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM Order_Details WHERE order_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND order_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT Customers.first_name, Addresses.city, Orders.total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Addresses ON Customers.customer_id = Addresses.customer_id JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id;

SELECT Customers.first_name, Products.product_name, Order_Details.quantity FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Order_Details ON Orders.order_id = Order_Details.order_id JOIN Products ON Order_Details.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Customers.customer_id = 1;
